name: What a nice room...
description:
You find yourself in this very nice and interesting room... But how can you get out of there? 

Made in 2 days for Jam Popular Brasileira #1

If you don't know how to control (it's nicer to find by yourself) You control the game by dragging the game window.
For those who have already finished the game Have you found the door mat?

AssetsSound: "Designed cinematic powerful, increasing whoosh leading into a dull boom, hit" from ZapSplat

Font: NicoClean by emhuo

AI Voice: Replica Studios
